summary: Comprehensive testing completed for ERW simulator dashboard. All backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend UI fully functional with all navigation, charts, tables, and AI chat working correctly. Dashboard shows 1.74B t COâ‚‚/yr total CDR from 1542 samples across 11 regions.
passed_tests: Backend API: Dashboard Overview returns valid data with 1542 samples
Backend API: Regions CDR returns 11 regions with valid data
Backend API: Feedstocks returns calcite with omega threshold 5
Backend API: Comparison returns omega threshold data
Backend API: All other endpoints (samples, filters, analytics, map data, chat) working
Frontend: Dashboard page loads with all KPI metrics (Total CDR, Avg CDR, Total Samples, Success Rate)
Frontend: CDR by Region bar chart and CDR Distribution pie chart render correctly
Frontend: Top Rivers table and Summary Statistics table display data
Frontend: Feedstock selector works with calcite selected
Frontend: Omega threshold buttons show omega-5 selected, others disabled
Frontend: Simulator page loads with scatter plots (discharge vs CDR, rock vs CDR)
Frontend: Simulator geographic view and samples table working
Frontend: Region filter dropdown works with 12 options
Frontend: Analytics page loads with all tabs (Distributions, Correlations, Regional Analysis)
Frontend: Comparison page loads with omega threshold card and comparison chart
Frontend: Data page loads with upload form and feedstocks table showing calcite
Frontend: Sidebar navigation works for all 5 pages
Frontend: AI Assistant chat widget opens, closes, and has input field
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (14/14 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (18/18 tests passed)
